overview: Stocky lads get you going?  Then Triga's all new 5 man Rugby Orgy is for you. This lot are a right load of dirty ruckers and they're all committing foul play: The props keep coming inside the hooker and that is strictly not allowed! And the scrum half is definitely going for the man and NOT the ball!  Where's the fuckin' ref when you need one???! LET'S ALL SCRUM TOGETHER LADS.
title: Grrr... Rugby
